profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.2.8 Extended graphics state - TR2 key
profile.description: An ExtGState dictionary shall not contain the TR2 key with a value other than Default
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: An ExtGState dictionary shall not contain the TR2 key with a value other than Default

error.message: An ExtGState dictionary contains the TR2 key with a value other than Default
